title: NDIS Eligibility Checker
description: Find out if you or a loved one may be eligible for the National Disability Insurance Scheme (NDIS) with our easy-to-use eligibility checker. Answer a few simple questions to determine your potential eligibility.

title: NDIS Budget Calculator
description: Understand how NDIS plan budgets are calculated and explore what supports might be included in your plan based on the NDIA's reasonable and necessary criteria.
